turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how may i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am trying to place an order at my local Starbucks on Walnut in Culver in Irvine, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds good. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking I'll go with the latte macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande with whole milk. Hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i wrote you down for 1 grande iced cafe americano with 2% milk from the starbucks on wall street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry about that, i mixed up orders.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it was for 1 hot latte macchiato with whole milk from the starbucks on outen and culver.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: There you go. Yeah, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the total is going to be $2.00.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Great. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i've placed the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it'll b ready in 15 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Nope, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, good bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.
